content: 9 abbreviations k - knit st - stitch p - purl sts - stitches kf&b - knit in to front and back of st increase 1 st st - stockinette stitch st co - cast on n1 - needle 1 p2tog - purl next two sts together decrease 1 st n2 - needle 2 w&t - wrap and turn slip next st from left rs - right side needle to right needle wrap working yarn ws - wrong side from back of work to front on a rs front of increase increase work to back on a ws slip_stitch back to left decrease - decrease needle and finish wrapping working yarn sl slip around to the back of your work for rs or ssk - slip next two sts knit ways and then k front of your work for ws them together through back loop decrease 1 st repeat - repeat sock pattern toe using judy s magic cast on co 12 16 18 sts each needle 24 32 36 sts total increase for toe round 1 - k all sts round 2 - increase 4 sts as follows n1 k1 kf&b k to last 2 sts kf&b k1 n2 k1 kf&b k to last 2 sts kf&b k1 repeat last 2 rounds until you have 28 32 36 sts on each needle for a total of 56 64 72 sts foot this is where you customize length continue in st st knitting every round until sock is approx 3 from back of heel when tried on *tip keep track of how many rounds you work to make matching the next sock a piece of cake gusset increase round 1 increase 2 sts as follows n1 k n2 k1 kf&b k to last 2 sts kf&b k1 round 2 k all sts repeat last two rounds until there are 44 54 62 sts on n2 n1 st count does not change turn the heel first k sts on n1 you will now work short-row back and forth on the sts on n2 only instructions are as follows row 1 rs k 30 36 41 kf&b k1 w&t row 2 ws p 19 21 23 puff&b p1 w&t row 3 rs k 17 19 21 kf&b k1 w&t row 4 ws p 15 17 19 puff&b p1 w&t row 5 rs k 13 15 17 kf&b k1 w&t row 6 ws p 11 13 15 puff&b p1 w&t row 7 rs k 9 11 13 kf&b k1 w&t row 8 ws p 7 9 11 puff&b p1 w&t n2 now has 52 62 70 sts you will have just completed a ws row turn to the rs knit to end of n2 picking up the wrapped sts as you go heel flap work sts on n1 heel flap is now worked back and forth on n2 sts row 1 rs picking up any wrapped sts as you go k39 46 52 ssk turn row 2 ws sl1 p26 30 34 p2tog
